title: What can you hire or purchase from K3 for your stock take
text: We have several options available to support our customers with their stock taking needs. For MStore customers- we have 6" Windows tablets with built-in 2D scanners available to rent by the day. These tablets are setup and configured in-house and shipped out to the customer a few days prior to them being required, the team will make a courtesy call to confirm the units have arrived safely and are powered on and connected to the sites Wi-Fi and pointing to the DB machine. Rentals can be arranged through our CSM Team. We have also just released a new 6.5" Android tablet with built-in 2D scanner with pistol trigger option for ease of use when scanning. These devices are available to purchase from our CSM Team. For customers purchasing the Android tablets they have the added advantage of being able to use them for stock taking and membership scanning. For non MStore customers- we offer the BHT 9000 range of handheld terminals with built in scanners, these are rented out by the day, setup and configured in-house and shipped out to the customer a few days prior to being needed. The units are shipped with a download data cable for transferring stock count to the back office system. Rental can be arrange through our CSM Team.
